enumeratorHelp:
DO NOT do this exercise if child did not answer any Level 1 question correctly.

This is an untimed exercise.

Select correct or incorrect/no response for each item below.

Early stop rule: If the child makes 4 successive errors, say 'Thank you!', and go on to the next exercise.

If the child uses an inefficient strategy (e.g., tick marks), ask the child 'Do you know another way to solve the problem?'

If the child does not respond after 5 seconds, or uses an inefficient strategy, provide the answer, mark the answer you provided as incorrect, and say 'Please go on.'
studentDialog:
Here are more addition exercises
You may use this paper and pencil if you want to. But you do not have to do so.

Kiswahili: Hapa kuna mazoezi mengine ya kuongeza.Ukipenda, waweza kutumia penseli na karatasi Lakini sio lazima.

Start here [Point to the first problem].
Kiswahili: Anzia hapa [elekeza kidole kwa tatizo la kwanza]
